instruction: Refill of Buprenorphine 8 mg / naloxone 2 mg sublingual film, emergency five-day supply issued.

attributes.sig: Take as directed by your healthcare provider.

instruction: Keep the blister packs tucked inside your jacket pocket overnight to prevent damage from cold temperatures.

attributes.comment: Keep the blister packs tucked inside your jacket pocket overnight to prevent damage from cold temperatures.

instruction: Massage or apply a warm compress to the injection site to ease the knot.

coding.display: Education about long term compression therapy

attributes.comment: Massage or apply a warm compress to the injection site to ease the knot.

instruction: Nudge the lockbox team this afternoon for the patient.

attributes.comment: Nudge the lockbox team this afternoon for the patient.
